title: Week 11 Matchups + Wheel of Shame, Pinching Pennies - Fantasy Football Podcast for 11/19
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode to help you get a win in Week 11! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Week 11 matchup breakdowns and injury updates. Plus, a recap of the Patriots vs Falcons game, and Mike spins the Wheel of Shame during the “Fantasy Faceoff” segment! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for November 19th, 2021.
  
 (01:45) - Thursday Night Recap: Patriots at Falcons
 (06:05) - FootClan Friday
 (07:20) - NFL News
 (15:15) - Fantasy Forecast 
 (15:40) - Washington Football Team at Panthers 
 (19:55) - 49ers at Jaguars
 (27:50) - Bengals at Raiders
 (33:35) - Cowboys at Chiefs
 (39:10) - Cardinals at Seahawks
 (42:50) - Steelers at Chargers
 (47:20) - Giants at Buccaneers
 (51:40) - Fantasy Faceoff & Wheel of Shame
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube

 Follow on Instagram
